mapper.select:
select
from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST ORDER by DDGL_ORDER_NUM DESC
select case when max(DDGL_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(DDGL_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST

select * from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ORDER_NUM = (select max(DDGL_ORDER_NUM) from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ORDER_NUM<(select DDGL_ORDER_NUM from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ID=#{ddglId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))

select * from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ORDER_NUM = (select min(DDGL_ORDER_NUM) from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ORDER_NUM>(select DDGL_ORDER_NUM from TDEV_DEMO_GEN_LIST where DDGL_ID=#{ddglId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
